title: Top Floor Luxurious Three Bedroom with Great Views of Castle Rock!
posting_body: ['Talus Flats', '2355 Mercantile Street, Castle Rock, CO, 80109', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 74', 'OR Text', '74', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'MODERN APARTMENTS COMING IN 2021', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1433 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Talus Flats offers modern apartment homes designed with amenities for a busy lifestyle.', 'The community wraps around two well-appointed courtyards perfect for relaxing.', 'Private parking garages tuck under the building, and open parking areas are spread throughout.', 'Enclosed upscale corridors lead to each luxury 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment home.', 'Inside reveals open-concept living & kitchen spaces filled with white cabinetry, tile backsplashes, and generous natural light.', 'Bedrooms hold abundant storage in roomy walk-in closets, and every apartment contains a full-size washer & dryer.', 'The community will also feature an on-site restaurant with delivery available to our residents.', 'Features', '- Patio/Balcony', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Quartz Countertops', '- Pet Friendly', '- Window Coverings', '- Washer/Dryer -', 'In Unit', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Carpet', 'Community Amenities', '- Walking/Biking Trails', '- Extensive Fitness Center', '- Gas Grills', '- Recreation Center Passes', '- Courtyard', '- Gameroom', '- Community Lounge', 'Driving Directions', 'We are conveniently located off the Meadows Pkwy exit in north Castle Rock.', 'We are minutes away from Castle Rock Adventist Hospital.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We are pet friendly, and would love to meet your furry family!', 'Contact the leasing office for more information.', '465r5N83u']
